channel.title: Comments on: Announcements with Dr. Petty: Patientory

item.title: By: Sma Morgan
item.dc:creator: Sma Morgan
item.description: Great podcast and excited for Chrissa's company! Excited to see more healthcare startups. Super pumped about Bowhead's healthcare/blockchain application http://www.bowheadhealth.com/ as well. We need more of these smart contracts in the healthcare space.
item.content:encoded: Great podcast and excited for Chrissa’s company! Excited to see more healthcare startups. Super pumped about Bowhead’s healthcare/blockchain application http://www.bowheadhealth.com/ as well. We need more of these smart contracts in the healthcare space.
